hero_section.title: Quantum Router Simulator
hero_section.subtitle: A tool for simulating quantum network routing protocols.

problem_section.title: The Challenge of Quantum Routing
problem_section.description: Quantum networks are the next frontier in communication, but routing information through them is a complex challenge. Unlike classical networks, quantum information is fragile and can be easily lost. We need new protocols to ensure reliable and efficient quantum communication.

solution_section.title: Simulating the Future of Quantum Networks
solution_section.description: Our Quantum Router Simulator provides a platform for researchers and developers to design and test new quantum routing protocols. By simulating the behavior of quantum routers and the effects of noise and decoherence, we can accelerate the development of a global quantum internet.

features.name: Realistic Quantum Physics
features.description: Our simulator accurately models the principles of quantum mechanics, including entanglement, superposition, and decoherence.

features.name: Customizable Network Topologies
features.description: Create and test your routing protocols on a variety of network topologies, from simple lines to complex meshes.

features.name: Extensible Protocol Support
features.description: Easily add your own quantum routing protocols to the simulator and compare their performance against existing ones.
